attributes.action: Petition to get the horse that kicked Dappy in the face knighted for his contribution to humanity and music.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned would like to petition the government to add the horse in this news article (http://www.theguardian.com/music/2013/nov/29/dappy-ndubz-kicked-face-horse) to the yearly honours list. If not a knighthood is there some sort of award that can be given to animals for their contribution to music.
By putting Dappy in hospital it has undoubtedly done a great good for music in general and this good should be awarded.
